title: Harden to Philly? Simmons to Brooklyn?
description:
Bill Simmons and Kevin O’Connor discuss the trade rumors around James Harden and Ben Simmons. This conversation originally occurred on Spotify Greenroom.
Hosts: Kevin O'Connor and Bill Simmons
Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
